quote: Health is a state of body. Wellness is a state of being.
author: J. Stanford

quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The key to a healthy life is having a healthy mind.
Wellness encompasses a healthy body, a sound mind, and a tranquil spirit. Enjoy the journey as you strive for wellness.
author: Laurette Gagnon Beaulieu

quote: You don't have to be perfect to be healthy.
Self-care is how you take your power back.
author: Lalah Delia

quote: Happiness is the highest form of health.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: A calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Your well-being affects (and is affected by) those waves through small ripples of self-care and the decisions you make.
author: Melissa Steginus

quote: Wellness is not the absence of illness but the presence of happiness, purpose, and vitality.
